citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00 pm on
March 3, 2014. A responsible adult needs to be available at all times to conduct animal welfare inspections to
ensure compliance.
I made contact with the licensee and he moved to a new facility. Explained the notification of changes to business
regulation to this licensee.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00 pm on
March 3, 2014.  A responsible adult needs to be available at all times to conduct animal welfare inspections to
ensure compliance.
I made contact with the licensee and he moved to a new facility.  Explained the notification of changes to business
regulation to this licensee.
